page.title: 16Mum's Diary / Dads Diary
page.content:
6.00pm.Went to see the children's grandparents who live in Fishponds. We met Amy's and Rebecca's uncle and auntie and their two boys. We had tea there and the children played. 7.45pm. Arrived home, tidied up and put the girls to bed. 9.00pm. Went next door to Barbara's. At last I think I can do my typing. I shall practise some more tomorrow. 11.00pm.Was tired so went to bed. { { {DAD'S DAIRY. April 9th.1985}
9.30am. Woke up and went downstairs for breakfast which consisted of Weetabix, toast and fruit juice. 10.30am. Got caught for the washing up again.
